Node.definition: = action by which humans supervise, direct or oversee work (such as building or repairing) or worship (such as singing or playing instruments)
= musical instrument with strings, such as a lute (כִּנֹּור) or lyre (נֵבֶל)
= a type of song (שִׁיר) probably to be accompanied by musical instruments
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state of extreme displeasure; ≈ often associated with fire and smoke
literally: to judge; hence: = action by which humans or deities inflict a penalty on others as retribution for what they have done
= state in which humans and deities experience excitement ◄ caused by anger

= action by which humans or deities respond to negative behavior of (other) humans by administering some sort of punishment, which may range from a verbal rebuke to physical correction, ► often done with corrective intent, but sometimes also as retribution

Node.gloss: to be kindly disposed|to be generous|to be merciful|to be gracious|to pity
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are favorably disposed to (other) humans, and act accordingly
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state of being unable to function as can be expected; ◄ as a result of difficult circumstances; ► results include weakness, sadness, and shame
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

= causative action by which humans or deities help or cause (other) humans to be restored to health or physical strength after a disease or an accident; this could also refer to the wound or disease itself
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to be in anguish|to be dismayed
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience a great fear combined with severe distress, often accompanied by physical symptoms, such trembling and pain
literally: bones; hence: = the physical body of a human being

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood

Node.gloss: to be in anguish|to be dismayed
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience a great fear combined with severe distress, often accompanied by physical symptoms, such trembling and pain
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y

= reference to an unknown point in time; ► normally used with the purpose of finding out which point in time is intended; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that this point of time may never arrive

Node.gloss: to turn back from|to give up|to retire from
Node.definition: literally: to turn (from an activity); hence: = action by which humans or deities stop being engaged in a certain activity
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which deities bring humans out of a dangerous situation

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= abode of the dead; ≈ considered to be a remote place, deep in the earth, with power over humankind, without remembrance, without praising God
literally: remembrance; hence: = action by which memories of certain divine activities are celebrated in word or song

= abode of the dead, a place of darkness and silence, located deep in the earth and inaccessible, where there is neither compassion nor wisdom; ≈ regarded as a place that is never satisfied; often personified; going there before one's time is considered a punishment

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= action by which humans openly express recognition of what someone else has done or achieved

Node.gloss: to grow weary|to wear oneself out|to labor|to toil
Node.definition: = action by which humans are engaged in laborious activity which requires a lot of energy and ultimately results in exhaustion
= act by which humans make a deep inarticulate sound ◄ caused by pain, grief, or severe suffering
= causative action by which humans cause an object to be thoroughly wet, ◄ as if it has to swim
= the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship
= a low platform standing on four legs, a bit longer than the length of a man, and about 70 80 centimeters wide; ► used by people of means to sit or sleep on
= fluid appearing in the eye; ≈ primarily associated with grief and mourning
= a low platform standing on four legs, a bit longer than the length of a man, and about 70 80 centimeters wide
literally: to cause to melt; hence: = causative process by which an object is made soaking wet
= process by which part of the human body loses strength and therefore becomes unable to function well ◄ as a result of grief
= state in which human experience displeasure, which is said to reside in their heart (לֵב) ◄ and is caused by their own condition or by someone else

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= process by which parts of the body lose strength and therefore become unable to function well; ◄ caused by grief or illness
= person that opposes other people and so is a cause of distress to others
= action by which a person or deity carries out some purposeful activity, in order to create something or cause something to happen
= great wickedness and depravity, as a trait of certain human beings, which is expressed in thoughts, words, and actions; ≈ regarded as unacceptable and worthy of punishment by God
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which someone express his/her grief or sorrow by shedding tears, crying loud and making appropriate gestures, ◄ because of some personal or national calamity, or for a dead person
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= to try to win a favorable attitude from someone else; ◄ by approaching that person in a very humble way
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans speak to a deity, often by raising their hands, ► requesting help or expressing their thankfulness

Node.gloss: to be ashamed|to come to shame|to be put to shame|to be disappointed
Node.definition: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status

Node.gloss: to be in anguish|to be dismayed
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience a great fear combined with severe distress, often accompanied by physical symptoms, such trembling and pain
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which humans stop moving into a certain direction and start moving back into the direction they came from

Node.gloss: to be ashamed|to come to shame|to be put to shame|to be disappointed
Node.definition: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status
= a very short length of time
